name: MortalKombatChooseYourDestiny(UNOFFICIAL)
0:
”Alexa ask Choose Your Destiny to choose Scorpion”
”Alexa open Choose Your Destiny for Raiden”
”Alexa ask Choose Your Destiny for Help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: choose your destiny
des:
Iksterog Innovations invites you to TEST YOUR MIGHT with our new skill- Mortal Kombat: Choose Your Destiny! Featuring the roster of the original seven fighters from the first Mortal Kombat game; Choose Your Destiny allows you to enact a wide variety of randomized player matches, commentary, and introductions by Shang Tsung. Open our application and call your favorite Kombatant, Kano, Liu Kang, Raiden, Johnny Cage, Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Sonya or ask for help. Who knows, you may even find the Special Character! Choose Your Destiny!

I would love to work on VERSION 2 of Mortal Kombat: Choose Your Destiny, which would allow me to expand the roster to Mortal Kombat 2, as well as utilize the latest in Amazon Alexa audio mixing with APLA. Rate our app, tell me what you like or don't like! Visit our Twitter or email us and say HELLO! IKSTEROG INNOVATIONS is always working on new apps and projects! Be sure to check out our existing and upcoming apps. Belch Brothers Burp, which is out now, our soon to be released Pokedex app- Pokemon Catalogue, our sleep sounds Star Wars app, and our up-and-coming stock market app where your personalized stock quotes and unrealized gains are calculated and read or sent to you when you want them!

THIS APP IS UNOFFICIAL, IT IS IN NO WAY AFFILIATED WITH WARNER BROS OR NETHERREALM STUDIOS. 

ALL ARTWORK AND AUDIO ARE DERIVED FROM MURDOINK AND MORTAL KOMBAT WHEREHOUSE.COM. IN ACCORDANCE IN FAIR USE LAW WITH EXPLICATE PERMISSION FROM THE AFOREMENTIONED PARTY(S).

To support our other apps and projects, app support, or to stay up to date with our goings on, check out our social media. If you have any questions or just want to shoot the breeze, send us an email!

twitter: https://twitter.com/iksterogi
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Iksterog-Innovations
email: iksterog.innovations@outlook.com

TRY SAYING
Shown in English (GB) English (US) English (AU) English (CA) English (IN)

* Alexa, OPEN CHOOSE YOUR DESTINY
* Alexa, open Choose Your Destiny for Scorpion
* Alexa, open Choose Your Destiny for Raiden
* Alexa, ask Choose Your Destiny for Help
* Alexa, open Choose Your Destiny for Liu Kang
* Alexa, open Choose Your Destiny for Sonya
* Alexa, start Choose Your Destiny with Johnny Cage
* Alexa, start Choose Your Destiny for Sub-Zero
* Alexa, open Choose Your Destiny and choose Sub-Zero
* Alexa, ask Choose Your Destiny for Sub-Zero
* Alexa, ask Choose Your Destiny and choose Sub-Zero
* Alexa, ask Choose Your Destiny to choose Raiden
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
